mongodb_uri_secret_arn.description: Secrets Manager secret ARN containing MONGODB_URI

description.constant_value: Security group for VPC interface endpoints

assign_public_ip.description: Assign public IPs to tasks (not recommended; keep false for private subnets).

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_image.description: Full container image URI (including tag) to run in ECS. If null, uses the created ECR repo with image_tag.

enable_vpc_endpoints.description: Create interface/gateway VPC endpoints for ECR/Logs/Secrets/STS/S3 to reduce NAT usage.

image_tag.description: Image tag to use when container_image is null.

mongodb_allowed_cidrs.description: Optional egress restriction: CIDRs allowed for MongoDB traffic. If empty, allows all egress (0.0.0.0/0).

mongodb_uri.description: MongoDB connection string. If null, you must set mongodb_uri_secret_arn.

mongodb_uri_secret_arn.description: Existing Secrets Manager secret ARN containing MONGODB_URI. If set, Terraform will not create a new secret.

private_subnet_cidrs.description: Private subnet CIDRs (length must be >= az_count).

public_subnet_cidrs.description: Public subnet CIDRs (length must be >= az_count).

single_nat_gateway.description: Use a single NAT gateway (lower cost) instead of one per AZ.

tags.description: Tags applied to all taggable resources.
